body:
### Usage:
The Javadoc has plenty of information on how to use wordsearch-solver. You can generate it by using `mvn clean install`.

Sample usage:
```
String[][] puzzle = ...
BasicGrid grid = new BasicGrid(puzzle); // You can create your own implementation of Grid if your puzzle is not from a String[][]
WordsearchSolver solver = new WordsearchSolver(grid);
solver.findWord("cheese");
```

### License:
wordsearch-solver is licensed under the very permissive [MIT License](http://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php).
